= Redports Architecture =

http://people.freebsd.org/~decke/redports/redports-arch.jpg

==Repository==
  [http://subversion.apache.org/ Subversion Repository] for users

===Frontend==
  [http://trac.edgewall.org/ Trac] Frontend with [http://code.google.com/p/redports/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fredports-trac Redports plugin]

===Dispatcher===
  [http://code.google.com/p/redports/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Frpdd rpdd] distributes build jobs to multiple backends

===Backend===
  [http://tinderbox.marcuscom.com/ FreeBSD Ports Tinderbox] and [http://code.google.com/p/redports/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Frptinderbox rptinderbox scripts]
